main: ^Hi, I will answer as far as I know.
question1: ^Did you come to this cafe before?
^Did you have any encounter with the cafe owner?
^I have no more questions for you. Thank you

answer1: ^I think I saw the waitress prepare my drink.
^But it looked like she was just messing around with the coffee machine.
^So yeah, probably she's the one who caused my stomachache.
answer2: ^This is the first time I stepped into this cafe.
^I probably won't come here ever again.
answer3: ^Oh, if you are talking about that guy with a beard, yes.
^He was also there when I was using the bathroom.
^But seriously, who would wear an apron to the bathroom?

b: ^, you should know that I am innocent.

answer3version2: ^Maybe you would like to know that I encountered the owner in the bathroom just now.
^I don't know what he was doing with his apron in the bathroom.

b: ^, you should know that I am innocent.
